actions.name: Scalding Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage + 3 (1d6) fire.

actions.name: Scalding Splash (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Summons a giant ladle full of boiling water that pours down on a point it can see within 60' of it extinguishing exposed flames within 10 ft. of that point. Each creature within 10 ft. of that point must make a DC 13 Con save. On a failure a creature takes 14 (4d6) fire and is scalded for 1 min. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn't scalded. A scalded creature has disadvantage on weapon attack rolls and on Con saves to maintain concentration. A scalded creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Wis (DC 13) only wand of bound fir required: At will: augury create or destroy water fog cloud3/day: lesser restoration

special_abilities.name: Hazesight
special_abilities.desc: Can see through areas obscured by fog smoke and steam with o penalty.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 10 min.
